title: NSE shares surge after IPO clouds seem to clear
full_text: NSE shares surge after IPO clouds seem to clear. National Stock Exchange shares climbed past ₹2,000. This surge followed SEBI chief's comments on an upcoming IPO clearance. Investor interest has rekindled. NSE shares saw increased demand and trading volumes. The exchange's IPO is expected soon. This develop…. Mumbai: Shares of National Stock Exchange (NSE) once again climbed above the 2,000 mark, surging 6% in unlisted trading on Monday, after the Securities and Exchange Board of India chief's comments ov… [+2145 chars]
